workflow.name: WIP-Hack-a-Thon - Umbrella- Alerting V3 - Incident Aggregation
workflow.title: WIP-Hack-a-Thon - Umbrella- Alerting V3 - Incident Aggregation

properties.name: Temp_Domain_Table
properties.description: Temp domain table to store unique domain values

Enable near real time notification for Umbrella Security events
- Notify in Cisco Webex or others
- Create Casebook and create or update  Incident in CTR
- Create Case in The Hive
- Create Case in ServiceNow
- Notification update in Cisco Team
- Feeds the stat table

Set Global Variable Umbrella_loop_counter to 500 before to run
Enable Triggers 5mn for permanent execution
properties.display_name: WIP-Hack-a-Thon - Umbrella- Alerting V3 - Incident Aggregation

properties.description: Check the loop counter (global variable). If not 500 it means a workflow is still running so do nothing)
Limit to 500 iteration set by SXAO global env variable
